alert.note: Alert for Phillips; Sedgwick (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 27 at 12:02AM MDT until June 27 at 12:30AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM MDT FOR NORTHEASTERN PHILLIPS AND EASTERN SEDGWICK COUNTIES... At 1202 AM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles northwest of Venango, or 15 miles southeast of Julesburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northeastern Phillips and eastern Sedgwick Counties. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
